message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $9,500. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but my price reflects the true value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $8,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
